spells.name: Dual shot
spells.description: The archer fires two arrows at the same time.

spells.name: Rapid shot
spells.description: The shooting frequency increases, at expenses of the accuracy.

spells.name: Grounding arrow
spells.description: The arrow is shot to the opponent's feet, hindering movement.

spells.name: Lightness
spells.description: The archer is naturally fast and light.

spells.name: Meditation
spells.description: A meditation period makes the archer be more aware of her surroundings.

spells.name: Adaptability
spells.description: The archer can rapidly adapt to combat conditions and get the best advantage.

spells.name: Tear apart
spells.description: The arrow tears apart the opponent's flesh, which bleeds over time.

spells.name: Duelist
spells.description: The archer is adept at firing rapidly and with precision.

spells.name: Hinder
spells.description: The enemy movement and attack is hampered.

spells.name: Repetition shot
spells.description: Multiple shots in arc. Those in the area receive piercing damage.

spells.name: Shield piercing
spells.description: An arrow is fired with such a strength it cuts through all defenses.

spells.name: Parabolic shot
spells.description: The shot range increases, but the efficiency decreases.

spells.name: Maneuver
spells.description: A quick analysis of the battle allows the archer to find the best evasive technique.

spells.name: Eagle's eye
spells.description: The impact chances are increased.

spells.name: Point shot
spells.description: The archer observes air spots in armor, increasing critical hit chance.

spells.name: Omnipresent
spells.description: The archer rapidly finds the best way to penetrate defenses.

spells.name: Break apart
spells.description: The arrow tears away the opponent's flesh.

spells.name: Specialist
spells.description: The archer is adept to finding the maximum weakness spots.

spells.name: Obfuscate
spells.description: The opponent loses hit visual focus, her critical hit chances decreases.

spells.name: Projectile rain
spells.description: Multiple parabolic shots to an area damage those who are in it.

spells.name: Ambush
spells.description: The enemy gets surprised. While disoriented, It won't be able to attack.

spells.name: Sudden strike
spells.description: The archer attacks while the opponent is off guard. The target defenses are lowered down.

spells.name: Stunning fist
spells.description: Rapid punch to the nose with the hand that holds the bow.

spells.name: Retaliation
spells.description: Part of the damage received in the next enemy impact is returned to the attacker. This skill wears off by duration or when first attack is received.

spells.name: Sticky touch
spells.description: The archer throws a sticky substance to the opponent, hindering her movement.

spells.name: Dirty fighting
spells.description: Archer improves short ranged damage.

spells.name: Finesse
spells.description: The archer is adept to maneuver and feint while fighting.

spells.name: Sentinel
spells.description: The hunter enhances her senses.

spells.name: Distracting shot
spells.description: A random shot distracts the opponent, who fails to react.

spells.name: Caltrop's arrow
spells.description: An arrow that scatters caltrops damaging the opponent's feet. Reduces enemy movement speed on the impact area.

spells.name: Dodge
spells.description: Resists next crowd control effect

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: The archer runs faster.

spells.name: Evasive tactics
spells.description: The archer fires while dodging. Her defenses increase, but her attack effectiveness decreases.

spells.name: Cat reflexes
spells.description: The archer enhances their reflexes for a mayor capacity to elude attacks.

spells.name: Acrobatic
spells.description: Using acrobatics, the archer reduces the lethality of the received physical attacks.

spells.name: Spell elude
spells.description: The archer moves constantly to reduce enemy spell impact chances.

spells.name: Escapist
spells.description: The archer becomes agile and evades almost every enemy attack.

spells.name: Wits
spells.description: The archer knows how to take advantage of the situation and power using.

spells.name: Low profile
spells.description: The archer cannot attack or be attacked. (Removes any positive effect that is active on the archer)

spells.name: Son of the wind
spells.description: The archer moves and evades easy as the wind. She evades almost any attack and spell.

spells.name: Ensnaring arrow
spells.description: A fast arrow shot at the opponent's legs. Inflicts damage and reduces movement.

spells.name: Death sentence
spells.description: The hunter marks the target. While the power is active, every attack from within 3 meters to the target cause extra damage.

spells.name: Enemy surveillance
spells.description: Gathers tactical information about realm enemies. (Can be used under the effects of Camouflage).

spells.name: Wild spirit
spells.description: The hunter is adept at moving through hostile enviroments.

spells.name: Camouflage
spells.description:
The hunter merges with the surroundings. While the effect is active, the hunter causes an extra damage in his first attack.

The hunter loses control of his pet when launching this power.

spells.name: Inherited Lightness
spells.description: The hunter has an aura that benefits allies in dexterity, which will help other archers, and basic mana regeneration.

spells.name: Cold blood
spells.description: The hunter attacks his victim in cold blood, inflicting large amounts of damage.

spells.name: Reveal
spells.description: Guided by her instinct and by hints from the environment, the hunter throws a flaming arrow, revealing the position of hidden enemies. It cancels the effects of Camouflage, <s>Camouflage Corpse</s> and Stalker Surroundings active on enemies.

spells.name: Confuse
spells.description: The enemy is constantly distracted. He cannot use non-offensive powers (Any spell that do not inflict direct damage).

spells.name: Stalker surroundings
spells.description: Allies near the hunter become invisible when the power is cast. They also have their movement speed reduced. Getting away from the hunter, attacking a target or interacting with objects removes the effect.

spells.name: Natural Dominance
spells.description: Through a bond with the environment, the hunter has chances to tame a creature.

spells.name: Heal Pet
spells.description: The hunter heals her pet.

spells.name: Wild Defense
spells.description: Part of the damage received by the hunter is redirected to the pet.

spells.name: Prominent Sight
spells.description: The hunter uses the bond with the pet to enhance the sight scope. The pet loses part of its attack power due to being distracted with the environment.

spells.name: Training
spells.description: Training keeps the pet strong and agile.

spells.name: Revive Pet
spells.description:
The hunter makes a pact with nature to return his pet to life.

When pet dies or the character has connected recently, the hunter will have to wait the specified time to use this skill.

The cast of this skill is lost if the is attacked.

It is required an appropriate level of Taming to use this skill.

spells.name: Bestial wrath
spells.description: The pet is overcome by a rage it cannot control. It gains strength at expenses of its dexterity.

spells.name: Natural armor
spells.description: The creature gains more resistance to damage.

spells.name: Nature's Fury
spells.description: The pet makes a pact with nature and converts surrounding matter into a dangerous explosion.

spells.name: Skin of the Beast
spells.description: The pet's thick contecture protects it from damage

spells.name: undefined
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.name: undefined2
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Horn of the Wind
spells.description: The Warmaster inspires his allies, whom earn movement speed. This power can only be casted if the player is near at least 4 allies.

spells.name: undefined3
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster's Might
spells.description: The Warmaster enhaces his class main attribute.

spells.name: undefined4
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Head of the Pack
spells.description: The Warmaster improves her damage for a short period of time. This power can only be casted if the player is near at least 1 ally.

spells.name: undefined5
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster Blood
spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.

spells.name: Recharged arrows
spells.description: The marksman channels her vital energy into arrows to improve damage. Only the basic attack is affected by this power.

spells.name: Winter stroke
spells.description: The marksman throws an ice burst to her opponent, receiving cold damage and remaining frozen.

spells.name: Burst of wind
spells.description: A burst of wind leaves the opponent dizzy.

spells.name: Serpent bite
spells.description: Special arrow that inflicts poison damage.

spells.name: Ignus scorch
spells.description: A flaming arrow burns whoever crosses its path.

spells.name: Ethereal arrow
spells.description: An incorporeal arrow ignores the target's protections.

spells.name: Needle blast
spells.description: The marksman fires an arrow that blasts into tiny pieces, causing slash damage in the area.

spells.name: Arcana strike
spells.description: An arrow that makes elemental damage.

spells.name: Fire rain
spells.description: The marksman fires an arrow that blows up in the sky and falls as a rain of fire.

spells.name: Lightning arrow
spells.description: An arrow that carries electrical damage strikes an objective and all of those that surround it.

spells.name: Dead eye
spells.description: The marksman takes her time to choose the right spot, maximizing the damage of her shots.

spells.name: Focus
spells.description: The marksman enhances the possibilities of descrying the enemy by moving slower..
spells.note: Power has no duration limits. (It may be deactivated)

spells.name: Skin piercer
spells.description: Attack centered in the opponent's skin, considerably reducing their resistances. Works only if the enemy has these resistance raised.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.description: Increases attack range.

spells.name: Cyclops curse
spells.description: Strike oriented to the opponent's eyes.

spells.name: Lethal strike
spells.description: It looks for critical areas in the blank.

spells.name: Strategic position
spells.description: The marskman knows how to locate herself in advantagous positions in battle.

spells.name: Trained eye
spells.description: The marksman improves her impact chances.

spells.name: Seeking strike
spells.description: The arrow fired automatically seeks a weakening spot in the target.

spells.name: Hawk's gaze
spells.description: The marksman can find her opponent and target her easily.

spells.name: undefined
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.name: undefined2
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Fire Arrow
spells.description: Launches a fire arrow over the ally, melting the ice that prevents movement.

spells.name: undefined3
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster's Might
spells.description: The Warmaster enhances his class main attribute.

spells.name: undefined4
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Killer Instinct
spells.description: The Warmaster ascends upon a state of absolute confidence, successfully hitting almost every shot.

spells.name: undefined5
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster Blood
spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.

spells.name: Arcane missile
spells.description: A small glowing ball hits the target, inflicting fire damage.

spells.name: Beetle swarm
spells.description: A beetle swarm surrounds the target.

spells.name: Blaze
spells.description: A burst of fire flows through the conjurer's hands, burning those in range.

spells.name: Mind push
spells.description: A mental expansive wave hits the objectives in the area.

spells.name: Pricking ivy
spells.description: A pricking ivy grows below the opponent's feet, surrounding and catching her.

spells.name: Will domain
spells.description: The wizard bends the opponent's will.

spells.name: Silence
spells.description: The target cannot speak, so she cannot use powers.

spells.name: Splinter wall
spells.description: The spell caster renders a surrounding pikes wall that damages any melee attacker.

spells.name: Time master
spells.description: The mage can manipulate temporal instances. Any opponent nearby remains static in time.

spells.name: Sultar's devouring mass
spells.description: A fog illusion devours the target, making her believe she is cut and torn.

spells.name: Energy barrier
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier that absorbs part of the damage received by the wizard.

spells.name: Mana burn
spells.description: Burns the opponent's mana, causing damage impossible to resist or soak.

spells.name: Synergy bond
spells.description: The wizard passes some of his own mana to an ally.

spells.name: Dragon's blood
spells.description: The wizard is naturally intelligent and gifted.

spells.name: Energy borrow
spells.description: The wizard steals mana points from the opponent and adds them to his own reserve.

spells.name: Ambitious sacrifice
spells.description: The wizard sacrifices his health to recover magical power.

spells.name: Arcane devotion
spells.description: Magic flows naturally inside the wizard. The casting speed is increased.

spells.name: Mana pool
spells.description: Increases the maximum mana reserve

spells.name: Mana communion
spells.description: The wizard creates a mana regenerating zone in which the allies can recover.

spells.name: Mana pylon
spells.description:
The wizard creates an aura of protective energy to cover its nearby allies.

Any ally close to the caster increments its protective barrier up to 2500 energy points limit.

Any ally that exits the aura's influence area loses immediately all stored barrier points.

spells.name: Fire magnification
spells.description: The wizard channels fire damage into her staff.

spells.name: Arcane acceleration
spells.description: The wizard gets faster in all the attacks with her staff.

spells.name: Arcane projection
spells.description: The wizard projects his magic range beyond her limits.

spells.name: Combat magic
spells.description: The wizard can manipulate and focus magic through her staff, increasing damage.

spells.name: Static field
spells.description: The wizard creates an energy field that reduces the movement of any foe that enters its area of influence.

spells.name: Ice magnification
spells.description: The wizard channels ice damage into her staff.

spells.name: Protection dome
spells.description: Allies under the cover of the dome improve their resistance to physical damage.

spells.name: Metabolic control
spells.description: The wizard is capable of manipulating her body's energies, arriving at optimal mind state.

spells.name: Lightning magnification
spells.description: The wizard channels lightning damage into her staff.

spells.name: Evendim's fury
spells.description: An explosion creates a magical interference transforming enemy mana into damage.

spells.name: Curse
spells.description: The target reduces her attack chance, and damage while the curse is active.

spells.name: Feline dexterity
spells.description: The wizard increases an ally's dexterity.

spells.name: Blindness
spells.description: A flash of light blinds the objective that gets miss chance until recovery.

spells.name: Bless
spells.description: The target increases her attack, damage and critical chance while the blessing is active.

spells.name: Bear strength
spells.description: The wizard increases an ally's strength.

spells.name: Bless weapon
spells.description: Increments weapon damage on any ally.

spells.name: Dispel magic
spells.description: Dispels enemy active effects on the caster or an ally.

spells.name: Fox wits
spells.description: The wizard increases an ally's intelligence.

spells.name: Clumsiness
spells.description: The objective becomes clumsy, gawky and slow.

spells.name: Mass dispel magic
spells.description: Dispels active effects on all allies in the effect area.

spells.name: Heal ally
spells.description: Heals an ally.

spells.name: Heal self
spells.description: Heals the caster.

spells.name: Resurrect
spells.description: Brings an ally back to life.

spells.name: Regenerate ally
spells.description: Heals an ally over time.

spells.name: Regenerate self
spells.description: Heals the caster over time.

spells.name: Divine intervention
spells.description: The ally becomes invulnerable to curses, sorcery and enchantments that diminish her efficiency. She remains vulnerable to damaging spells, even those that have negative side effects.

spells.name: Life savior
spells.description: Heals an ally.

spells.name: Greater regeneration
spells.description: Heals all allies nearby the caster.

spells.name: Greater healing
spells.description: Heals all allies nearby the target.

spells.name: Mass resurrection
spells.description: Revive the allies near the conjurer.

spells.name: Summon imps
spells.description: Summons imps that attack the selected target.

spells.name: Extraplanar bond
spells.description: The conjurer magically bonds to its summoning. Part of the received damage is redirected to it. (10% each spell level)

spells.name: Summon demon
spells.description: Summons a demon that fights for the conjurer.

spells.name: Material bond
spells.description: Improves the bond between the summoned creature and the material plane.

spells.name: Summon zombies
spells.description: Summons zombies that attack the selected target.

spells.name: Demonic rage
spells.description: Summoned creatures become aggressive, causing additional damage but losing all their armor.

spells.name: Summon golem
spells.description: Summons a stone golem that fights for the conjurer.

spells.name: Magical armor
spells.description: The creature gains more resistance to magical damage.

spells.name: Blood drinker
spells.description: Summoning earns life draining attacks. Part of the inflicted damage is taken as health for the current creature.

spells.name: Summon lich
spells.description: Summons a lich that fights for the conjurer.

spells.name: Force armor
spells.description: A force field is created that grants the conjurer extra protection.

spells.name: Shifting silhouette
spells.description: The objective ally silhouette gets blurry and confusing.

spells.name: Friendly shielding
spells.description: A force field is created surrounding an ally, it provides extra armor.

spells.name: Mind blank
spells.description: The conjurer gets resistance to crowd control effects.

spells.name: Karma mirror
spells.description: Reflects part of the damage received while the spell is active.

spells.name: Magic barrier
spells.description: Gives magic resistance to the target.

spells.name: Material wall
spells.description: Gives physical resistance to the target.

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.description:
The conjurer creates an invulnerability zone. He will not be able to attack or be attacked, but he will be able to move.

(Removes any positive effect that is active on the caster)

spells.name: Insightful
spells.description: The caster gains a duration bonus to all powers received from allies or herself.

spells.name: Steel skin
spells.description: The conjurer creates a magic mantle that significantly reduces slashing, piercing and blunt damage.

spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.name: undefined2
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Defensive Portal
spells.description: Creates a portal that allows teleporting up to 25 allies to one of the available realm's locations.

spells.name: undefined3
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster's Might
spells.description: Thanks to his/her years of experience the Warmaster can cast any spell faster than others.

spells.name: undefined4
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Divine Protection
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a protection spell that can be casted upon allies.

spells.name: undefined5
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster Blood
spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.

spells.name: Stalagmite
spells.description: A sharp rock comes out the earth, below the objective, who receives piercing and ice damage.

spells.name: Slow
spells.description: Decreases an opponent's movement speed.

spells.name: Petrify hands
spells.description: The hands of the opponent become stiff, hindering the attacks.

spells.name: Laziness
spells.description: The opponent feels tired and unwilling to fight.

spells.name: Meteor
spells.description: A huge flaming rock strikes the opponent.

spells.name: Wind wall
spells.description: A wind wall that surrounds the caster improves normal attacks and powers defense.

spells.name: Crystal blast
spells.description: A blast of sharp crystals damages all the opponents in the area.

spells.name: Fragility
spells.description: The objective becomes weak, fragile and vulnerable to physical damage.

spells.name: Golem fist
spells.description: An illusory golem falls from the sky inflicting blunt damage over the target.

spells.name: Sultar's Terror
spells.description: An illusory giant skull provokes fear over its enemies, pertifying and inflicting slashing and piercing damage to them.

spells.name: Vampirism
spells.description: The warlock drains health from a target, and adds it to her own reserve. She cannot drain more health than what is required to fully heal or more health than the objective's current points.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.description: The objective cannot be target of positive spells.

spells.name: Infuriate
spells.description: The warlock makes the target get enraged involuntarily and without noticing.

spells.name: Vitality absorption
spells.description: The caster transforms a share of the damage dealt to the opponents, while the spell lasts, into health.

spells.name: Sadistic guards
spells.description: The wandering souls controlled by the warlock surround a victim, weakening her defenses.

spells.name: Sadistic servants
spells.description: It calls the earth wandering souls. They attack a realm enemy from whom they drain mana.

spells.name: Soulkeeper
spells.description: The warlock weakens the target and drains its health, adding it to her own reserve. She cannot drain more health than what is required to fully heal or more health than the objective's current points. Cannot be casted on mobs.

spells.name: Cremation
spells.description: The warlock invokes a powerful spell that incinerates the corpse of an enemy. If the spell is successful, the enemy is sent to the Resurrection Altar

spells.name: Possess summoning
spells.description: If the spell is not resisted, the warlock has chances of controlling a summoned creature. The creature remains until killed (no duration).

spells.name: Master of doom
spells.description: A darkness aura surrounds the warlock breaking opponent's will in its area. The enemy has reduced constitution and cannot cast spells.

spells.name: Fire ball
spells.description: The caster launches a flame sphere that produces damage to all enemies in the impact area.

spells.name: Ice blast
spells.description: The target is struck by an ice blast.

spells.name: Lightning
spells.description: An electrical burst hits the target.

spells.name: Elemental conjunction
spells.description: The warlock develops natural resistance to elements damage.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: The target becomes frozen. She cannot attack nor be attacked.

spells.name: Frozen storm
spells.description: Opponents in the storm area will be damaged and get stunned.

spells.name: Element exposure
spells.description: The target becomes vulnerable to the elements.

spells.name: Magma blast
spells.description: A magma ball strikes the target.

spells.name: Twister
spells.description: An air eddy devours the opponents in the area.

spells.name: Summon lightning
spells.description: The warlock creates lightning bolts that strike all the opponents in an area.

spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.description: Creates a portal that allows teleporting up to 25 allies to one of the available location.

spells.description: Thanks to his/her years of experience the Warmaster can cast any spell faster than others.

spells.description: A Pricking ivy grows surrounding the Warlock to damage and immobolise near enemies.

spells.name: Warmaster Blood
spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.

spells.name: Charge
spells.description: Increases the effectiveness of attack and damage.

spells.name: Accurate swings
spells.description: Improves slashing damage while active.

spells.name: Disable limb
spells.description: A strike to the limbs hinders mobility.

spells.name: Athletic
spells.description: Enhanced agility and superior physical condition allows the warrior to be more effective while wielding a weapon, making each cut caused to the enemy take less effort and save energy in each attack

spells.name: South cross
spells.description: A double cross cut is executed.

spells.name: Crash
spells.description: A mighty attack shocks the opponent, who receives damage and loses evasive abilities.

spells.name: Devastate
spells.description: Executes an arc sweeping blow. All of the enemies in the area receive the weapon damage.

spells.name: Iron skin
spells.description: The fighter has resistance against blunt damage.

spells.name: Fatal strike
spells.description: A cut to the forehead fills with blood the opponent's vision.

spells.name: Typhoon
spells.description: A 360 degree atack, destabilizes and damages the enemies that are next to the warrior.

spells.name: Forceful blow
spells.description: A strong blow causes additional damage.

spells.name: Brutal impacts
spells.description: Improves blunt damage while active.

spells.name: Ribs breaker
spells.description: A blow to the ribs takes the air of the opponent lungs, he can't move.

spells.name: Lethal anatomy
spells.description: The warrior is naturally strong and powerful.

spells.name: Crushing
spells.description: Strong blow that breaks bones.

spells.name: Execution
spells.description: The warrior fights seeking the way to counter the attacks more effectively.

spells.name: Mind squasher
spells.description: Strong blow that removes positive effects that remain active on the target. Can only be used when the main weapon is of blunt damage.

spells.name: Steel temper
spells.description: The warrior is resistant to piercing damage.

spells.name: Jaw breaker
spells.description: A blow to the jaw makes the opponent dizzy.

spells.name: Thunder strike
spells.description: The warrior strikes the floor with his weapon, making it tremble and affecting the surrounding area.

spells.name: Gutting
spells.description: The weapon nails the opponent and reaps her appart, causing additional slashing damage.

spells.name: Agile maneuvers
spells.description: Improves piercing damage when active.

spells.name: Balestra
spells.description: The warrior attacks swiftly and rapidly, getting ahead of her opponent actions.

spells.name: Versatility
spells.description: The warrior combines agility with potency

spells.name: Ripost
spells.description: The warrior takes advantage of an opponent's bad move, and strikes with lethal accuracy.

spells.name: Impale
spells.description: The spear crosses the opponent from side to side.

spells.name: Brain piercing
spells.description: Distracting attack that allows the interruption of power casting.

spells.name: Bendable
spells.description: The warrior has resistance against slashing damage.

spells.name: Multiple thrust
spells.description: Multiple attacks strike in an arc area. Opponents in the area receive weapon damage.

spells.name: Lightning strike
spells.description: 360-degree strike. Opponents in area receive damage.

spells.name: Kick
spells.description: With a powerful kick, the enemy is thrown to the ground.

spells.name: Caution
spells.description: The warrior watches his defenses.

spells.name: Throat cutter
spells.description:
Inflicts a lethal attack. The objective dies instantly.

The victim should not have health over:
Level 1:150
Level 2:275
Level 3:400
Level 4:525
Level 5:650

spells.name: Martial defense
spells.description:
The warrior is trained in evasive techniques.
Reduce chances of receiving critical attacks.

spells.name: Rigorous Preparation
spells.description: Resists next crowd control effect

spells.name: Back slam
spells.description: A rapid fist slam to the face leaves the enemy dizzy.

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The allies that hear the call win movement speed until their first attack. This attack receives a damage bonus by charge.

spells.name: Intimidate
spells.description: The knight shouts a howl that slows his enemy.

spells.name: Disabling
spells.description: Strike to the opponent's leg that hinders her mobility.

spells.name: Martial reflexes
spells.description: The warrior increases twice the normal rate, her critical chance.

spells.name: Colossus
spells.description: The barbarian is possessed by a rage she cannot control. She wins strength at the expense of health

spells.name: Frenzy
spells.description: The barbarian becomes frenzied, ignoring the real amount of damage she receives.

spells.name: Off with their heads!!
spells.description: Gives damage bonus to any ally.

spells.name: Thirst for blood
spells.description: The barbarian channels all her fury. Normal attacks receive a damage bonus that increments on every successful impact. Power wears off by duration and also when inflicting 5 successful blows. Evaded and blocked attacks are not counted toward power expiration.

spells.name: Challenging Roar
spells.description: The barbarian gains confidence in frightening the opponent and improves her attacks.

spells.name: Deafening roar
spells.description: A powerful roar affects everyone who crosses its path

spells.name: Berserk
spells.description: Raging state in which the barbarian is not aware of anything but what she destroys.

spells.name: Overwhelming strength
spells.description: The barbarian gets a damage bonus on all attacks.

spells.name: Spring
spells.description: Allows the barbarian to quickly get closer to the enemy.

spells.name: Unstoppable Madness
spells.description: The barbarian enters a madness state in which he is almost immune to crowd control attempts.

spells.name: Threat
spells.description: Anyone near the barbarian will be intimidated and the critical hits they receive will be stronger.

spells.name: Spiritual blow
spells.description: The Barbarian extends an attack beyond her normal distance.

spells.name: Rend
spells.description: Tears away the target's flesh. The opponent keeps on bleeding.

spells.name: Beast attack
spells.description: A strike made with might deals a great amount of damage and shocks the opponent

spells.name: Howl
spells.description: The barbarian screams, insults and howls. His opponents can't concentrate enough to use their powers.

spells.name: Expansive wave
spells.description: An energy wave is created with the weapon. It makes blunt damage to all opponents in an arc area.

spells.name: Destabilize
spells.description: The barbarian reduces opponent evade chances by destabilizing her

spells.name: Fulminating
spells.description: The barbarian raises his damage significantly for a very short period of time.

spells.name: Hands of Steel
spells.description: Increase range and damage

spells.name: Rage of the earth
spells.description: A mighty blow on the earth provokes a tremor. Opponents in its path are damaged and knocked down

spells.name: undefined
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.name: undefined2
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster Beacon
spells.description: Places a beacon on the ground. Allies interacting with it will receive Warmaster's Defensive Blessing, which raises the maximum health.

spells.name: undefined3
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster's Might
spells.description: The Warmaster enhances his class main attribute.

spells.name: undefined4
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Heroic Shout
spells.description: A powerful shout intimidates all near-by opponents, reducing their movement speed.

spells.name: undefined5
spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster Blood
spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.

spells.name: Challenge
spells.description: The taunted enemy loses focus and makes mistakes.

spells.name: Taunt
spells.description: Makes the monster angry, increasing her aggressiveness towards the knight and reducing its protection drastically. A pet or summoning under the effect of this spell will stop obeying its master. The creature will become wild until the effect wears off. Dispel magic may return control to its owner.

spells.name: Feint
spells.description: Misleading maneuver.

spells.name: Protector Temple
spells.description: The knight is used to endure damage.

spells.name: Offensive stance
spells.description: The knight focuses his mind in maximizing the damage caused to his enemies. The power can be deactivated.

spells.name: Defensive Support
spells.description: The warrior adopts a tactic defense against crowd control effects, but moves more slowly.

spells.name: Troll's skin
spells.description: The knight's built constitution allows him to receive more strikes without being beaten.

spells.name: Knight's Haste
spells.description: The knight moves extremely fast for a very short duration, providing higher chances of helping an ally in need or to hunt down a foe.

spells.name: Heroic presence
spells.description: The knight confers protective tactical abilities to any ally that is within his area of influence.

spells.name: Army of one
spells.description: The knight is almost immune to damage.

spells.name: Block
spells.description: The knight earns 100% of blocking chances.

spells.name: Shield bash
spells.description: A rapid shield strike damages the opponent, making her dizzy.

spells.name: Protect ally
spells.description: Dispels crowd control active effects on an ally.

spells.name: Precise block
spells.description: The knight blocks all attacks and spells.

spells.name: Defensive stance
spells.description: The knight focuses his mind in minimizing the damage from enemies. The power can be deactivated.

spells.name: Ethereal mantle
spells.description: The knight can shield one ally against magic damage.

spells.name: Shield wall
spells.description: The knight shields the allies against physical damage.

spells.name: Steadiness
spells.description: The knight walks straight and grips to the floor. Reducing falling chances.

spells.name: Stars shield
spells.description: The knight grants a protection aura against magical damage to the allies in the area.

spells.name: Deflecting barrier
spells.description: The knight shields the allies in the rear against received ranged attacks. Reduces damage substantially.

spells.description: undefined

spells.name: War Council
spells.description: The Warmaster learns a war language that allows her to communicate with her status in secret.

spells.name: Paladin's Aid
spells.description: Thanks to the warring devotion, the Warmasters receives all of the attacks directed to the ally.

spells.description: undefined

spells.name: Warmaster's Might
spells.description: The Warmaster enhances his class main attribute.

spells.name: Blessed
spells.description: Thanks to his/her devotion the Warmaster receives a blessing to health.

spells.description: The Warmaster athletic capabilities increase due to long years of training.
